docs.summary: Triggered when a coupon is applied.
Triggered when a coupon is created.
Triggered when a coupon is deleted.
Triggered when a coupon specification is updated.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Coupon ID.

members.name: code
members.doc: Coupon code.

members.name: couponType
members.doc: Coupon type (e.g., moneyOffAmount, buyXGetY, percentOffRate).

members.name: discountValue
members.doc: Discount value (e.g., $10, 10%).

members.name: discountedCycleCount
members.doc: Amount of discounted cycles for subscription item. None specifies for all cycles.

members.name: isFreeShipping
members.doc: Whether the coupon type entitles free shipping.

members.name: name
members.doc: Name of the coupon applied.

members.name: afterDiscountAmount
members.doc: Line item price after applied discount.

members.name: discountAmount
members.doc: Discount amount, in case discount is applied per line.

members.name: entityId
members.doc: ID of the entity associated with the event.

members.name: eventTime
members.doc: Event timestamp.

members.name: id
members.doc: Event ID.

members.name: triggeredByAnonymizeRequest
members.doc: Whether the event was triggered as a result of a privacy regulation application (for example, [GDPR](https://support.wix.com/en/article/gdpr-frequently-asked-questions)). For advanced users.

members.name: totalFailures
members.doc: Number of items that couldn't be processed.

members.name: totalSuccesses
members.doc: Number of items that were successfully processed.

members.name: undetailedFailures
members.doc: Number of failures without details because detailed failure threshold was exceeded.

members.name: coupon
members.doc: New coupon.

members.name: itemMetadata
members.doc: Item metadata.

members.name: returnFullEntity
members.doc: Whether to return full coupon entity in the response. Defaults to `false`.

members.name: specifications
members.doc: List of coupon specifications to be created.

members.name: bulkActionMetadata
members.doc: Bulk action metadata.

members.name: results
members.doc: Items created by bulk action.

members.name: ids
members.doc: List of coupon IDs to delete.

members.name: deleteMetadata
members.doc: Bulk action metadata.

members.name: results
members.doc: Item metadata.

members.name: x
members.doc: Coupon type and information

members.name: y
members.doc: Coupon type and information

members.name: _id
members.doc: For calculating by coupon ID (usually for cart calculate phase).

members.name: cart
members.doc: Cart to which the coupon will be applied.

members.name: code
members.doc: For calculating by coupon code (usually for apply coupon phase - for validation).

members.name: currencySymbol
members.doc: Currency symbol for error message and applied coupon.

members.name: discount
members.doc: Type of in-memory discount that can be applied when coupon doesn't exist.

members.name: precision
members.doc: Round the result to <precision> places after the decimal dot. Defaults to 2 if not provided.

members.name: uniqueUserIdentifier
members.doc: Unique identifier of a buyer that applied the coupon. Used to limit coupon use per customer.

members.name: _id
members.doc: For calculating by coupon ID (usually for cart calculate phase).

members.name: code
members.doc: For calculating by coupon code (usually for apply coupon phase - for validation).

members.name: discount
members.doc: Type of in-memory discount that can be applied when coupon doesn't exist.

members.name: appliedCoupon
members.doc: Applied coupon information.

members.name: cart
members.doc: Cart after applying the coupon.

members.name: error
members.doc: Errors, in case call failed.

members.name: lineItems
members.doc: Array of cart line items.

members.name: shipping
members.doc: Cart shipping information.

members.name: totals
members.doc: Summary of cart totals.

description:
Cart is passed to coupon service's apply function in order to
apply the coupons calculation on it

members.name: _id
members.doc: Coupon ID (should not be passed on creation).

members.name: appId
members.doc: ID of the app that created the coupon. Empty if created by the site owner.

members.name: dateCreated
members.doc: Time the coupon was created (UNIX Epoch time in milliseconds).

members.name: displayData
members.doc: Coupon display information.

members.name: expired
members.doc: Whether the coupon is expired.

members.name: numberOfUsages
members.doc: How many times this coupon has been used.

members.name: specification
members.doc: Basic coupon metadata.

description:
The `Coupon` object represents all information available for a coupon
including its basic definition and runtime information.

members.name: coupon
members.doc: Applied coupon information.

members.name: wixAppId
members.doc:
ID of Wix app that applied the coupon. Supported values:
+ Wix Stores - `1380b703-ce81-ff05-f115-39571d94dfcd`
+ Wix Bookings - `13d21c63-b5ec-5912-8397-c3a5ddb27a97`
+ Wix Events - `140603ad-af8d-84a5-2c80-a0f60cb47351`

members.name: wixAppOrderId
members.doc: ID of the entity that the coupon was applied to (orderId, bookingId, etc.).

members.name: specification
members.doc: Coupon metadata. ID is ignored and created by the server.

members.name: _id
members.doc: ID of the newly created coupon.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Coupon ID.

members.name: formattedPrice
members.doc: Formatted price for display.

members.name: mediaItem
members.doc: Displayed media item information.

members.name: name
members.doc: Coupon name to be displayed.

members.name: code
members.doc: error code

members.name: message
members.doc: descriptive error message

members.name: _id
members.doc: Coupon ID.

members.name: coupon
members.doc: Requested coupon.

members.name: entityId
members.doc: Item ID (when the coupon scope is limited to just one item).

members.name: name
members.doc: Coupon scope's group (e.g., product or collection in Wix Stores). See [valid scope values](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/coupons/coupons/valid-scope-values).

members.name: hasCoupons
members.doc: True if site has ever had a coupon.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Coupon ID.

members.name: uniqueUserIdentifier
members.doc: Unique identifier of a buyer that applied the coupon. Used to limit coupon use per customer.

members.name: usedBy
members.doc: Unique ID of the entity that the coupon was applied to (e.g., orderId).

members.name: wixAppId
members.doc: ID of app that applied the coupon (e.g. bookings appDefId).

members.name: error
members.doc: Errors, in case call failed.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Item ID. Should always be available, unless it's impossible (for example, when failing to create an item).

members.name: error
members.doc: Details about the error in case of failure.

members.name: originalIndex
members.doc: Index of the item within the request array. Allows for correlation between request and response items.

members.name: success
members.doc: Whether the requested action was successful for this item. When `false`, the `error` field is populated.

members.name: amount
members.doc: Line item amount (while quantity = 1).

members.name: appliedDiscount
members.doc: Applied discount on line item after calculation.

members.name: externalId
members.doc: Item ID in the external system - will usually be a product ID.

members.name: lineId
members.doc: Cart line item ID - represents index position (required).

members.name: quantity
members.doc: Line item quantity. Must be greater than 0.

members.name: scopes
members.doc: Coupon scopes this line item applies to.

members.name: subscription
members.doc: Whether the line item is of type subscription.

description: represents a single line in the cart

members.name: height
members.doc: Media item height.

members.name: url
members.doc: Media item URL.

members.name: width
members.doc: Media item width.

members.name: limit
members.doc: Number of items to load.

members.name: offset
members.doc: Offset since the beginning of the collection.

members.name: filter
members.doc: Filter string (e.g., when {"expired":"true"}, expired coupons will be returned).

members.name: paging
members.doc: Optional pagination parameters

members.name: sort
members.doc: Sort string.

members.name: coupons
members.doc: Returned coupons.

members.name: totalResults
members.doc: Total results.

members.name: group
members.doc: Coupon scope's applied group (e.g., event or ticket in Wix Events)

members.name: namespace
members.doc: Scope namespace (Wix Stores, Wix Bookings, Wix Events)

members.name: amount
members.doc: Shipping price before applying the coupon.

members.name: appliedDiscount
members.doc: Discount on shipping price.

description:
represents the shipping line in the cart
the coupons need to know about it because of the free shipping coupon

members.name: active
members.doc: Whether the coupon is currently active (if not passed - the default is active).

members.name: appliesToSubscriptions
members.doc: Whether the coupon applies to subscription products.

members.name: buyXGetY
members.doc: For example: buy 3, get 1.

members.name: code
members.doc: Unique code entered to apply the coupon (up to 20 characters).

members.name: discountedCycleCount
members.doc:
Specifies the amount of discounted cycles for subscription item.
Can only be set when applies_to_subscriptions is true and scope namespace is 'pricingPlans'
Valid range is from 1 to 999, inclusive. Empty field specifies that the coupon applies to all available cycles.

members.name: expirationTime
members.doc: Coupon expiration time, in milliseconds (optional).

members.name: fixedPriceAmount
members.doc: Fixed sale price.

members.name: freeShipping
members.doc: Free shipping.

members.name: limitPerCustomer
members.doc: Maximum number of times the coupon can be used **per customer** (optional).

members.name: limitedToOneItem
members.doc: Whether the coupon is limited to one item.

members.name: minimumSubtotal
members.doc: Limit the coupon to carts with a subtotal above this number.

members.name: moneyOffAmount
members.doc: Discount as a fixed amount.

members.name: name
members.doc: Friendly name for display (up to 80 characters).

members.name: percentOffRate
members.doc: Discount as a percentage.

members.name: scope
members.doc: Specifies the type of line items this coupon will apply to. See [valid scope values](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/coupons/coupons/valid-scope-values).

members.name: startTime
members.doc: Coupon valid from, in milliseconds (required).

members.name: type
members.doc: Coupon type. Read-only.

members.name: usageLimit
members.doc: Maximum number of times the coupon can be used (optional).

members.name: buyXGetY
members.doc: For example: buy 3, get 1.

members.name: fixedPriceAmount
members.doc: Fixed sale price.

members.name: freeShipping
members.doc: Free shipping.

members.name: moneyOffAmount
members.doc: Discount as a fixed amount.

members.name: percentOffRate
members.doc: Discount as a percentage.

members.name: minimumSubtotal
members.doc: Limit the coupon to carts with a subtotal above this number.

members.name: scope
members.doc: Specifies the type of line items this coupon will apply to. See [valid scope values](https://dev.wix.com/api/rest/coupons/coupons/valid-scope-values).

members.name: discount
members.doc: Sum of all discounts.

members.name: subTotal
members.doc: Cart subtotal.

members.name: _id
members.doc: Coupon ID.

members.name: fieldMask
members.doc: Field mask of fields to update (required - passing an empty `fieldMask` will return an error). Valid field masks are any of those in the `specification` field.

members.name: specification
members.doc: Coupon metadata to change. Changing the type is not allowed.
